highlights: Designed, developed and demonstrated an end-to-end decommissioning solution for Sellafield's Integrated Innovation for Nuclear Decommissioning (IIND) SBRI contest.
Co-authored the chapter for the in-house robotics middleware, CorteX, in Software Engineering for Robotics book published by Springer.
Collaborated with various external stakeholders, ranging from academic institutions to small businesses and industry leading companies, to represent RACE and its technologies.
